name: Alex P.
title: Setup was fast and painless
text: Launched my first program in a weekend. The templates and onboarding made everything simple.

name: Jordan M.
title: Great support
text: The team answered questions quickly and helped me migrate my content.

name: Taylor R.
title: All-in-one is convenient
text: Nice to have courses, email, and funnels together. Saved me from juggling logins.
